title: ESS权限运用和wb圈地出现工作台
author: 论坛好网友
txt_content:
捡起权限单独：
破坏权限单独：
开箱子权限单独：
方块互交权限：
如何取消ESS wb工作台
实现边界指令圈地

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
EssentialsAntiBuild
#放置
 essentials.build.place.<id>
 essentials.build.place.<id>:<data>
#破坏
 essentials.build.break.<id>
 essentials.build.break.<id>:<data>
#交互
 essentials.build.interact.<id>
 essentials.build.interact.<id>:<data>
#合成
 essentials.build.craft.<id>
 essentials.build.craft.<id>:<data>
#拾取
 essentials.build.pickup.<id>
 essentials.build.pickup.<id>:<data>
#丢弃
 essentials.build.drop.<id>
 essentials.build.drop.<id>:<data>复制代码用法 permissions:
 - essentials.build.*
 - -essentials.build.place.29复制代码wb
Essentials.jar中plugins.yml
  workbench:
    description: Opens up a workbench.
    usage: /<command>
    #删掉wb
    aliases: [craft,ecraft,wb,ewb,wbench,ewbench,eworkbench]复制代码设置边界
/wb set <r>
